About the Company: VKJ Infradevelopers Ltd was incorporated in 2010 as a Private Limited Company under the name "VKJ Infra Developers Pvt. Limited". They initially started its operations by way trading into construction related materials, primarily soils and sands. The main civil works they are engaged in consists of land and site development, land filling, fencing walls etc. Currently, they are engaged in the business of Land Development, Civil Construction and trading in construction materials, primarily soils and sands. Currently they are headquartered in Delhi.
